Treatment of idiopathic SNLGM

* Symptomatic treatment of nephrotic syndrome.
* Prolonged high-dose oral corticosteroid therapy, with adjuvant treatments (diet, calcium, vitamin D, etc.).

question.question: Which of the following is a key principle in the treatment of idiopathic SNLGM (Steroid-Naive Lupus Glomerulonephritis)?
question.option_a: Immediate high-dose intravenous corticosteroid therapy without adjuvant treatments
question.option_c: Prolonged high-dose oral corticosteroid therapy, with adjuvant treatments (diet, calcium, vitamin D, etc.)
question.option_d: Symptomatic treatment of nephrotic syndrome only, without corticosteroid therapy
